Quote: Everyone's life is a warfare, and that long and various.
Author: Epictetus

Quote: Enjoy the sound of silence.
Author: Timothy Salter

Quote: Do not wait for anybody or anything. Do whatever you can. Build your hope on none.
Author: Swami Vivekananda

Quote: Eveyone we meet is either a lesson or a gift. Move forward accordingly.
Author: Unknown

Quote: It's better to have loved and lost that to stay home every night and download increasingly shameful pornography.
Author: Raj Koothrappali

Quote: Sometimes it's not the people who change, it's the mask that falls off.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
Author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Quote: Don't waste your time worrying about other people--unless it affects the common good. It will keep you from doing anything useful.
Author: Marcus Aurelius

Quote: Everyday it gets a little bit easier. But you gotta do it everyday that's the hard part. But it does get easier.
Author: Bojack Horseman

Quote: There are four elements: earth, wind, fire, water...Therefore playing with your iPhone is the same as playing with dirt...We are god's iPhone
Author: Kanye West

Quote: I would rather die of passion then die of boredom
Author: Vincent Van Gogh

Quote: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak
Author: Sun Tzu

Quote: If you don't heal what hurt you, you'll bleed on people who didn't cut you
Author: Unknown

Quote: You must concentrate upon and consecrate yourself wholly to each day, as though a fire were raging in your hair
Author: Taisen Deshimaru

Quote: Everyone is always telling me to cut my circles smaller, but he who travels alone travels faster, but he who travels with others travels farther
Author: Nick Diaz

Quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: Men in general are quick to believe that which they wish to be true
Author: Julius Ceaser

Quote: Talent hits a target no one else can hit. Genius hits a target noone else can see
Author: Arthur Schopenhauer

Quote: The most efficient way to live reasonably is every morning to make a plan of one's day and every night to examine the results obtained
Author: Alexis Carrel

Quote: We will never have a perfect world, but it's not romantic or naive to work toward a better one.
Author: Steven Pinker

Quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit
Author: Aristotle

Quote: The whole is more than the sum of its parts
Author: Aristotle

Quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves
Author: Aristotle

Quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit
Author: Aristotle

Quote: The soul is healed by being with children
Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

Quote: A friend to all is a friend to none
Author: Aristotle

Quote: The law is reason, free from passion
Author: Aristotle

Quote: Man is by nature a politcal animal
Author: Aristotle

Quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
Author: Aristotle

Quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
Author: Aristotle

Quote: To live without hope is to cease to live
Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

Quote: Nothing is easier than to denounce the evildoer; nothing is more difficult than to understanad him
Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

Quote: If there is no God, everything is permitted
Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

Quote: Don't tell me the mooon is shining; show me the glint of light on broken glass
Author: Anton Chekhov

Quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice
Author: Anton Chekhov

Quote: Any idiot can face a crisis - it's day to day living that wears you out
Author: Anton Chekhov

Quote: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Quote: Life's most persistant and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Quote: I have decided to stick with love. Hate is too great a burden to bear
Author: Martin Luther King Jr.

Quote: Nothing will work unless you do
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: I've learned that people will forget what you said, people will forget what you did, but people never forget how you made them feel
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: When you learn, teach. When you get, give
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all
Author: Noam Chomsky

Quote: Everyone's worried about stopping terrorism. Well, there's a really easy way: stop participating in it
Author: Noam Chomsky

Quote: Education is a system of imposed ignorance
Author: Noam Chomsky

Quote: The Bible is one of the most genocidal books in human history
Author: Noam Chomsky

Quote: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Quote: Courage is grace under pressure
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Quote: But man is not made for defeat. A man can be destroyed but not defeated
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Quote: There is nothing to writing. All you do is sit down at a typewriter and bleed
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Quote: There is nothing noble in being superior to your fellow man; true nobility is being superior to your former self
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are srong at the broken places
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Quote: An unexamined life is not wirth living
Author: Socrates

Quote: The only thing I know, and that is that I know nothing
Author: Socrates

Quote: When the debate is over, slander becomes the tool of the loser
Author: Socrates

Quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing
Author: Socrates

Quote: To find yourself, think for yourself
Author: Socrates

Quote: Education is the kindling of a flame, not the filling of a vessel
Author: Socrates

Quote: Beware the barrenness of a busy life
Author: Socrates

Quote: I cannot teach anybody anything, I can only make them think
Author: Socrates

Quote: There is only one good, knowledge, and one evil, ignorance
Author: Socrates

Quote: There is nothing impossible to him who will try
Author: Alexander the Great

Quote: Remember upon the conduct of each depends the fate of all
Author: Alexander the Great

Quote: I had rather excel others in the knowledge of what is excellent, than in the extent of my power and dominion.
Author: Alexander the Great

Quote: I am not afraid of an army of lions led by a sheep; I am afraid of an army of sheep led by a lion
Author: Alexander the Great

Quote: Atheism is nothing more than the noises reasonable people make when in the presence of religious dogma
Author: Sam Harris

Quote: The ahtiest, by merely being in touch with reality, appears shamefully out of touch with the fantasy life of his neighbors
Author: Sam Harris

Quote: Science, in the broadest sense, includes all reasonable claims to knowledge about ourselves and the world
Author: Sam Harris

Quote: The problem is that religion tends to give people bad reasons to be good
Author: Sam Harris

Quote: It's simply untrue that religion provides the only framework for a universal morality
Author: Sam Harris

Quote: You only lose what you cling to
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: It is a man's own mind, not his enemy or foe, that lures him to evil ways
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: Chaos is inherent in all compunded things. Strive on with diligence
Author: Gautama Buddha

Quote: What I cannot create, I do not understand.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quote: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself and you are the easiest person to fool.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quote: I was born not knowing and have had only a little time to change that here and there.
Author: Richard Feynman

Quote: I believe that a scientist looking at nonscientific problems is just as dumb as the next guy
Author: Richard Feynman

Quote: I find in myself a desire which no experience in this world can satisfy, the most probable explanation is that I was made for another world
Author: C.S. Lewis

Quote: Pity a man in a familiar places who yet feels like a stranger
Author: Peter Griffin

Quote: Perfection and power are ovverated
Author: Uncle Iroh

Quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: Without haste, but without rest.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: Few people have the imagination for reality
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: Whatever you can do or dream you can, begin it. Boldness has genius,power, and magic in it.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: Nothing is worth more than this day
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: We are shaped and fashioned by what we love
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: Years of love have been forgot, in the hatred of a minute
Author: Edgar Allen Poe

Quote: I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity
Author: Edgar Allen Poe

Quote: Quoth the raven, Nevermore!
Author: Edgar Allen Poe

Quote: We loved with a love that was more than love
Author: Edgar Allen Poe

Quote: Never to suffer would never to have been blessed
Author: Edgar Allen Poe

Quote: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night
Author: Edgar Allen Poe

Quote: Her voice is full of money
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quote: Never confuse a single defeat with a final defeat
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quote: Show me a hero and I will write you a tragedy
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quote: There are no second acts in American lives
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quote: Everyone suspects himself of at least one of the cardinal virtues, and this is mine: I am one of the few honest people that I have ever known.
Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: Kindness is the language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: Lies, damned lies, and statistics
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: The man who does not read good books has no advantage over the man who cannot read them.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: I am in the temper that if I were under water I would scarely kick to come to the top.
Author: John Keats
